question: Which among the following is not under the priority sector lending scheme of RBI?
explanation:
Priority Sector scheme of RBI includes the following categories:
(i) Agriculture
(ii) Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
(iii) Export Credit
(iv) Education
(v) Housing
(vi) Social Infrastructure
(vii) Renewable Energy
(viii) Others
The food processing and horticulture comes under agriculture as they are allied activities under agriculture..
